name: Remote Control Ui
description:
Download Now->

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.remotecontroler.offlinecontroler.mobileremotecontroler


App Description:

Have you ever thought of controlling your TV, AC or many other electronic devices through your mobile phone? Ever wanted that your android phone would work like a remote control? But now it is possible. Remote Control is the app developed for your android phone that makes your device a remote control. You can control any TV with your mobile phone acting as a remote control very easily using this remote-control app.
